1017.16.text:

1022.71.text: I’ll teach you how to look cool.

1032.30.text:

model.

1042.30.text:
I generally have two or three photo shoots
a day and I’m frequently on the cover of

1050.88.text:

1057.51.text:
I post to Facebook once or twice a day and
I tweet and snap chat.

1066.89.text: I was in Paris last week and London last month.

1072.52.text:
A fun fact – I know I look very fit but
I don’t usually work out.

1078.24.text:
I normally take a walk three times a day but
that’s all.

1082.70.text: How often do I go out to parties?

1085.84.text:
Well every night, but I'm rarely home later
than 3 am.

1091.32.text: I hardly ever stay up till 4.

1094.44.text: I’ve got to look my best, you see.

1097.99.text: Yes, it’s not easy being a star like me.

1101.93.text: It’s a dog’s life, but I never complain.

1106.12.text:
It’s just the price I have to pay for being
famous.
